casebody.data:
Patricia Ashley BOWEN
v.
STATE of Louisiana, EX REL. SECRETARY OF HEALTH AND HOSPITALS, Earl K. Long Medical Center; Louisiana State University Agricultural and Mechanical College, through LSU Health Care Services Division, Manager of Earl K. Long and Stratos Elevator Company and Starnet Insurance Company; and York Risk Services Group, and Fara, A York Risk Service Company NO. 2018-C-0771 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 21, 2018 Denied. JOHNSON, C.J., would grant.

HUGHES, J., would grant.

GENOVESE, J., would grant.
